settings.title: press
settings.subheading: What people are saying about us.

settings.subtitle: Sneakhype
settings.title: taylrd makes the best t-shirts money can buy
settings.text: These days, there is no shortage of companies making basic t-shirts. But few are able to do it as well as TAYLRD. TAYLRD is creating extremely comfortable, well-fitting and high quality t-shirts at super wallet friendly prices.

settings.subtitle: New York Post
settings.title: Former Fashion Exec  Wants To Make  Menswear Affordable
settings.text: “Targeting 20-somethings who are joining the workforce for the first time and need to build an affordable wardrobe.”

settings.subtitle: Men's journal
settings.title: Cool and Comfortable  Short-Sleeved  Button-Downs
settings.text: “This brand-spanking-new company based in New York knows how to have fun without going over the top.”

settings.subtitle: INC.
settings.title: Wearing Ties to Work?  This Company Wants You  to Stop Immediately
settings.text: “With leaders like Jobs and Zuckerberg rejecting suits and ties, Taylrd aims to help us complete the abandonment of the formal office."

settings.subtitle: GSMagzine
settings.title: Men’s Classic Short & Long Sleeve Henley Shirts by Taylrd: It’s Casual
settings.text: Casual and Comfortable without looking disheveled is how we like to describe Henley shirts for men. Wear em in, wear em out, wear em half in/half out slap on a pair of premium slim fit jeans or chinos and you’re good to go.

settings.title: Great style starts with a great fit
In The Beginning…
settings.text: We were surprised how difficult it was to find high-quality clothing with the right fit. The clothes that did fit were often uncomfortable or absurdly expensive—and that just didn’t sit well with us. TAYLRD is the solution to that problem. We provide you with a comfortable, well-fitting menswear option. One that won’t break the bank. For a tailored fit without the tailored price tag, try TAYLRD clothing.

settings.title: The TAYLRD process
settings.text: It isn’t easy to make clothing that fits your body, lifestyle, and budget. We’ve curated combinations of high-end fabrics from all over the world for just the right amount of stretch. And we’ve tested our measurements out on all shapes and sizes—so we’re certain you can find your perfect fit here. Thanks to your feedback, our process evolves with you. That means we’re always improving. It also means we’re proudest when you’re most satisfied.

settings.subtitle: A wardrobe
settings.title: Ready To Rock
settings.text:
TAYRLD is more than a pair of pants. It’s a lifestyle. Whether you’re headed into the office or out on the town, our clothing fits just right. It’s stylish, comfortable, and durable. And it provides just enough stretch to match your active lifestyle.

When your clothes fit correctly, style is effortless.

settings.title: The Goose Chase Ends Here
settings.text:
Finding the perfect fit doesn’t have to be a hassle. It should be effortless. So give TAYLRD a shot, and find your fit.

Click here to FIND YOUR FIT

settings.title: your new favorite pants
settings.text: We've re-engineered your every-day chinos in our new 4-Way Stretch, Moisture Wicking, Spill Resistant Fabric.

settings.subtitle: FINAL SALE
settings.title: up to 70% off
settings.text: All Your Favorite TAYLRD Items at World Class Prices

settings.text_1: With sharp, tailored silhouette, our bomber jacket is set to be your new wardrobe essential.
settings.text_2: Made from a premium, waterproof fabric, you can dress it up or keep it casual.
settings.text_3:
Special collar that adjusts to the shape of your neck

Contrast Piping insert

2 interior welt packets and 1 patch pocket

settings.text_2: Same Great Fit and Fabrics as our Stretch Chinos

settings.text_1: We started TAYLRD because we couldn’t find pants that fit. They were either too tight or boxy. After countless fits, fabrics, and prototypes, we fixed it with our Stretch Chinos.
settings.text_2: Using our Signature Contoured Waistband, we can ensure that our pants curve to the natural shape of your waistline.
settings.text_3: A trimmer, better fitting cut and the perfect rise are the final touch to complete the perfect fit

settings.text_1: The perfect transitional jacket for all seasons. Lightweight, Waterproof, with a hood for whatever weather comes at you
settings.text_2: 2 Side Pockets and Front Chest Media Pocket
settings.text_3: Self Adjusting Waistband to Ensure Perfect Fit

settings.text_1: Sure there are a few things men’s shirts have in common, but that doesn’t mean you don’t have options. Our collection of long sleeve button downs include in a wide range of sizes, fabrics, colors and prints.
settings.text_2: All with our slim and standard fit options. Fits built for any body.
settings.text_3: Oxfords, Plaids, Flannels, & Prints to cover you for any occasion.

settings.text_1: Sure there are a few things men’s shirts have in common, but that doesn’t mean you don’t have options. Our collection of short and long sleeve button downs include in a wide range of sizes, fabrics, colors and prints.
settings.text_2: All with our slim and standard fit options. Fits built for any body.
settings.text_3: Oxfords, Plaids, Flannels, & Prints to cover you for any occasion.

settings.text_1: We wanted 5 Pocket Pants & Jeans that fit just as well, and were as comfortable as our Chinos. So we made them.
settings.text_2: Our most casual style. Cut with half-moon pockets and trimmed with brass rivets and a shank button fly.
settings.text_3: A trimmer, better fitting cut and the perfect rise are the final touch to complete the perfect fit.

settings.text_1: Made in USA in small-batch, family run factories, we sourced a Cotton Slub that is breathable yet durable.
settings.text_2: 3 button collar that allows you to button up or dress down.
settings.text_3: Lets you move how you want with out constricting in the shoulders.

settings.text_1: We’ve combined the comfort and flexibility of your favorite athletic pants to bring you the best every day mens pants on the market.
settings.text_2: For our Tech Chinos, we’ve created a proprietary fabric that is moisture wicking, machine washable, water-resistant, and has four-way stretch.
settings.text_3: For the guy who needs a little extra momentum in his day, say hello to your new favorite pair of pants.

settings.title: TAYLRD X SXSW
settings.subheading: Austin TX, Come Visit Our Pop Up Store

settings.text: Subscribe to get 20% off your first order and other exclusive deals

settings.title: Meet our trailer
settings.text: Custom built to bring our shopping experience to you, our trailer is always stocked with the best we have to offer. Come by to feel the fabrics, grab a drink, and have a good time.

settings.text_1: Come in the trailer and try on anything in our collection. With a private changing room, you can find the right fit for you.
settings.text_2: Never a lack of smiles around the trailer, our games and contest make stopping by fun.
settings.text_3: Do want to shop or play games? Just come say "Hey", meet the team and learn more about our story!

settings.title: TECH CHINOS
settings.text: The staple every-day pant with a more classic body and taper. Features slant front pockets and buttoned back pockets.

settings.title: Tech 5 Pocket Pants
settings.text: A more casual pant with a closer body and taper. Features denim-style upright pockets and patch.

settings.title: the best pants can get.
settings.text: We’ve combined the comfort and flexibility of your favorite athletic pants with the durability of office slacks. Our Tech Collection features a proprietary technical fabric that is water resistant, moisture wicking, machine washable, and has four-way stretch. For the guy who wants versatility, comfort, and uncompromising style, say hello to your new favorite pair of pants.

settings.title: FITS
settings.text_1: Our Signature Fit. Tapered from thigh through the leg down to give you the modern-day tailored look. Slimmer than our Slim Fit pants.
settings.text_2: Built for guys with bigger thighs. A little more room in the seat with a more subtle taper starting at the mid-thigh. Extra room to breathe, but won’t ever look loose on you.

settings.title: Real Reviews
settings.testimonial_1: Perfect Fit. Tech is where it’s at. These pants are extremely comfortable and mobile. If I could do the splits, I would be able to do them in these pants.
settings.testimonial_2: I bought the slim fit pant and they fit perfectly. Nice lightweight feel to the fabric and the stretch is great and super comfortable. I’ll definitely be getting a couple more colors.

settings.text_1: Our 4-Way Stretch material lets you move how you want, while still looking your best.
settings.text_2: Unique 8-Inch inseam thats not too short, but still sits comfortably above the knee.
settings.text_3: Moisture wicking and liquid resistant. Moves sweat off your skin and keeps you cool on the go. With Fresh Protection against smells.

settings.text_1: 7 inch inseam that sits slightly above the knee.
settings.text_2: Polyester baja twill and a handful of features, these trunks are the perfect mix of comfort, style, and function.
settings.text_3: Elastic waistband, drawstring, two front slant pockets and one back buttoned pocket.
